Description: Civil engineering design - Underground Utilities Design Drawing Set
Notes: Drawing set production including storm drainage plans/profiles; OWS layout; duct banks; trenchless crossings; CAD technician hours included

Description: Civil engineering design - Underground Utilities Technical Specification
Notes: Specification development for storm drainage; OWS; duct banks; trenchless crossings; materials and workmanship requirements

Description: Civil engineering design - Underground Utilities Design Calculations
Notes: Hydraulic calculations; OWS sizing; duct bank capacity analysis; trenchless crossing structural calculations

Description: Civil engineering design - Underground Utilities Data Sheet Package
Notes: Equipment and material data sheets for OWS; pipes; instrumentation; pumps
CCTV inspection of storm drainage pipes; defect analysis; remediation recommendations; video file archival; assumes 800-1200 LM survey extent
HDPE/concrete/PVC storm pipes DN150-DN600; approximately 800-1200 LM total; includes fittings; bedding materials; pipe material pricing per A-009
Precast concrete manholes (15-25 units) and catch basins (25-40 units); includes frames/covers/castings; manhole pricing per A-009
Packaged OWS unit 50-100 L/s capacity; includes internals; instrumentation (level; flow; oil layer monitors; alarms); piping/sumps; OWS pricing per A-009 and A-023 discharge limits
PVC/HDPE conduit 400-600 LM total; concrete encasement; pull boxes (10-15 units); conduit pricing per A-009
Excavation (1500-2500 m³); pipe laying (800-1200 LM); manhole/catch basin installation; backfill/compaction; includes dewatering (A-016); shoring (A-017); labor/equipment per A-010/A-011
OWS equipment installation; piping connections; instrumentation installation; sump construction; electrical tie-ins; testing support; labor/equipment per A-010/A-011
Trench excavation; conduit installation; concrete encasement; pull box installation; backfill/compaction; includes shoring/dewatering; labor/equipment per A-010/A-011
Auger boring or HDD (4-8 crossings; 15-40m each); casing pipe DN200-DN600; carrier pipe installation; grouting; entry/exit pits; mobilization; boring services per A-012
Traffic management and access control; environmental protection during construction (erosion/sediment control; SWPPP); site restoration; cleanup; assumptions per A-018 and A-019
CI = 0.18 × CD ($975k); includes site supervision; temporary facilities; HSE; QA/QC field inspection; construction management; small tools; per fallback typical model
P = 0.02 × MAT ($570k); includes material sourcing; PO processing; expediting; receiving inspection; material documentation; per fallback typical model
PM = 0.06 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1721k); includes project management; engineering management; schedule/cost control; contract administration; stakeholder coordination; per fallback typical model

COM = 0.03 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1721k); includes pre-commissioning; performance testing per DEL-03.05 (pressure testing; CCTV; OWS performance verification; as-built survey); system acceptance; handover; per fallback typical model
